projects.title: ValoHub
projects.description: A full-stack platform showcasing Valorant skins and accounts, where users can explore available options and contact the owner directly for more information.
features: Developed a full-stack platform showcasing Valorant skins and accounts
Implemented an admin dashboard allowing secure access for administrators to log in and update site content

projects.title: Netflix-GPT
projects.description: An intelligent movie recommendation platform that generates personalized movie suggestions based on user-provided prompts, using GPT-powered analysis to tailor recommendations.
features: Developed an intelligent movie recommendation platform
Enabled OpenAI API key input for users, empowering them to input unique prompts and receive tailored movie recommendations

projects.title: GitFinder
projects.description: A dynamic GitHub user details interface utilizing the GitHub API, responsive design principles, and ReactJS.
features: Created a dynamic GitHub user details interface utilizing the GitHub API
Enhanced proficiency in React and developed strong skills in DOM manipulation and API integration
